heading: Operation Overlord.
general-note: Here are entered works on the military planning and diplomatic negotiations for the Normandy invasion during World War II. Works on the military strategy to deceive the German High Command over the Normandy invasion are entered under. Operation Fortitude.. Works on the Normandy invasion and campaign of 1944 are entered under. World War, 1939-1945--Campaigns--France--Normandy..
